The image was originally posted on a Twi: Fascinating Pictures" on April 25, 2017, which gained attention on social media.
The original photograph: taken by a user named Serge A. on 500px, showed a squirrel with its arms crossed but not the stream of water arching over its head.
The process of creating the manipulated: selecting the splash, making it transparent, and pasting it onto the original squirrel image. Adjustments were made to color settings to match the photo.
